C

Console - Class in ktbyte.gui
This GUI element acts as a Command-line interface, accepting user input and handling custom responses.
Console(PApplet, int, int, int, int) - Constructor for class ktbyte.gui.Console
This constructs a new Console object within the current context (PApplet), starting from the x and y coordinates, having a given width and height
